summary: Sunny gives up a promising future to return to her hometown to care for her ailing father and finds herself working at a bowling alley. When a charming high school rival returns for the holidays, Sunny is forced to reexamine her life.
cast: Trieste Kelly Dunn|Ryan Hunter|Kevin Wheatley|Linda Lee McBride|Marc Petersen|Carol Kahn Parker|Lance Brannon|David McElfresh|Justin McElfresh|Victor Aminger
title: The New Year
